channel.title: Comments on: Copycat! Apple Sues Samsung

item.title: By: Why I’ve taken a stand against Apple: From a Marketing & Business Perspective « Bleacher Views
item.dc:creator: Why I’ve taken a stand against Apple: From a Marketing & Business Perspective « Bleacher Views
item.description: [...] for the technology section of a news blog, I wrote quite favorably in their opinion. (More: Here, here, and here.) However, as many can clearly see, my tone towards Apple has changed considerably [...]
